text: He granthadharakanno! Tumacyajavala amace paigambara (muham'mada sallallahu alaihi vasallama) ale aheta, je aneka asa gosti sangata aheta, jya grantha (taurata ani injila) cya gosti tumhi lapavita hote, ani bahuteka gostinna sodata ahata. Tumacyajavala allahatarphe nura (divya teja) ani spasta asa grantha (pavitra kura'ana) ye'una pohocala ahe
